multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is NOT related to the business case?

choicegroup.choice: It is the feasibility study to prove that the project is worth the organization’s time and resources
It lists the objectives of the project
It is prepared by Project sponsor and senior leader. Once it is approved, it will become the official sign off to start the project
It is the case studies which are learned from the project and is collected from team members by the project manager
